page.description: Sleep for specified number of seconds.

argument.name: Seconds
argument.description: An integral or fractional number of seconds. Numeric

page.discussion: SLEEP() pauses the execution of a script for the specified number of Seconds. Seconds can be a fractional number.

section.title: Example
section.description: Pauses a script for 1/10 of a second.
This example displays a message for 5 seconds.
section.example: ui_modeless_dlg_box("Message",<<%dlg% {position=1,1} This message will appear for 5 seconds... %dlg%) xbasic_wait_for_idle() sleep(5) ui_modeless_dlg_close("Message")
